Eleven Chinese fishermen were indicted in a court in Palawan for violating the section 87 ( Poaching in Philippine Waters ) of the Philippine Fisheries Code of 1998 .
They also violated the code 's section 97 , which covers the act of taking rare or endangered species .
The cases filed against the latter have already been dismissed and repatriation was already recommended by the Department of Justice ( DOJ ) .
